documentation.text:
@dev The LiquidityProxy is a proxy contract of Pool that allows users to mint liquidity tokens with just Dai.
 Likewise, allows users to burn liquidity tokens and receive only Dai, either by paying yDai debt or by selling yDai on the Pool.
@dev The constructor links ControllerDai to vat, pot, controller and pool.
@dev Return to caller all posted chai if there is no debt, converted to dai, plus any dai remaining in the contract.

@dev The LiquidityProxy is a proxy contract of Pool that allows users to mint liquidity tokens with just Dai.
 Likewise, allows users to burn liquidity tokens and receive only Dai, either by paying yDai debt or by selling yDai on the Pool.
@dev The constructor links ControllerDai to vat, pot, controller and pool.
@dev Return to caller all posted chai if there is no debt, converted to dai, plus any dai remaining in the contract.

devdoc.details: The LiquidityProxy is a proxy contract of Pool that allows users to mint liquidity tokens with just Dai. Likewise, allows users to burn liquidity tokens and receive only Dai, either by paying yDai debt or by selling yDai on the Pool.

addLiquidity(uint256,uint256).details: Mints liquidity with provided Dai by borrowing yDai with some of the Dai. Caller must have approved the proxy using`controller.addDelegate(liquidityProxy)` and `pool.addDelegate(liquidityProxy)` Caller must have approved the dai transfer with `dai.approve(daiUsed)`

params.daiUsed: amount of Dai to use to mint liquidity.
params.maxYDai: maximum amount of yDai to be borrowed to mint liquidity.

returns._0: The amount of liquidity tokens minted.

constructor.details: The constructor links ControllerDai to vat, pot, controller and pool.

removeLiquidityEarly(uint256,uint256).details: Burns tokens and repays yDai debt. Buys needed yDai or sells any excess, and all Dai is returned. Caller must have approved the proxy using`controller.addDelegate(liquidityProxy)` and `pool.addDelegate(liquidityProxy)` Caller must have approved the liquidity burn with `pool.approve(poolTokens)`

params.minimumDai: minimum amount of Dai to be bought with yDai when burning.
params.poolTokens: amount of pool tokens to burn.

removeLiquidityMature(uint256).details: Burns tokens and repays yDai debt after Maturity.  Caller must have approved the proxy using`controller.addDelegate(liquidityProxy)` Caller must have approved the liquidity burn with `pool.approve(poolTokens)`

params.poolTokens: amount of pool tokens to burn.
